issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: The problem is a duplicate of an existing issue.
resolution.name: Duplicate

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description: Under moderate to high concurrent query workload Metastore gets deadlocked in DataNucleus
fields.summary: Race condition in DataNucleus makes Metastore to hang

comments.body:
For stack trace see: http://www.datanucleus.org/servlet/jira/browse/NUCRDBMS-837
This has been fixed in : http://www.datanucleus.org/servlet/jira/browse/NUCRDBMS-887
I am preparing a patch to upgrade DN to 4.x line, will post that soon.

{color:red}Overall{color}: -1 no tests executed

Here are the results of testing the latest attachment:
https://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12740218/HIVE-11036.patch
